00056

00077     enum ALIGN_METHOD  {
00078       ALIGN_GLOBAL   = 0,
00079       ALIGN_LOCAL    = 1,
00080       ALIGN_GLOBLOC  = 2,
00081       ALIGN_FREEENDS = 3
00082     };
00083 
00084     class  Alignment : public io::Stream  {
00085 
00086       public :
00087 
00088         Alignment  ();
00089         Alignment  ( io::RPStream Object );
00090         ~Alignment ();
00091 
00092         void SetAffineModel ( realtype WGap,   realtype WSpace  );
00093         void SetScores      ( realtype SEqual, realtype SNEqual );
00094 
00095         void Align          ( cpstr S, cpstr T,
00096                               ALIGN_METHOD Method=ALIGN_GLOBAL );
00097 
00098         inline pstr     GetAlignedS()  {  return AlgnS;      }
00099         inline pstr     GetAlignedT()  {  return AlgnT;      }
00100         inline realtype GetScore   ()  {  return VAchieved;  }
00101         inline char     GetSpace   ()  {  return Space;      }
00102 
00103         realtype GetSimilarity(); // Score-weighted sequence id
00104         realtype GetSeqId     (); // Primitive sequence id
00105 
00106         virtual void OutputResults ( io::RFile f, cpstr S, cpstr T  );
00107 
00108         void read  ( io::RFile f );
00109         void write ( io::RFile f );
00110 
00111       protected :
00112 
00113         char     Space;
00114         int      AlignKey, SLen,TLen;
00115         rmatrix  VT,ET,FT;
00116         pstr     AlgnS,AlgnT;
00117         realtype VAchieved;
00118         realtype SEq,SNEq, Wg,Ws;
00119 
00120         virtual void  InitAlignment();
00121         virtual void  FreeMemory   ();
00122         virtual realtype  Score    ( char A, char B );
00123 
00124         void    BuildGATable ( cpstr S, cpstr T,
00125                                bool FreeSEnd, bool FreeTEnd );
00126         void    BuildLATable ( cpstr S, cpstr T );
00127         void    Backtrace    ( cpstr S, cpstr T, int J, int I,
00128                                bool StopAtZero );
00129         void    AdjustEnds   ( cpstr S, cpstr T, int J, int I );
00130         void    PrintVT      ( cpstr S, cpstr T );

00132     };
